Package ch.ethz.inspire.emod.utils

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Descriptionable  
    Floodable
    Interface to define common methods of Floodable Machine Components, such as: - Pipe, Tank, Pump Usage: - in ch.ethz.inspire.emod.utils.FluidCircuit to flood components with fluid - in Machine class to get all the Floodable components
    Parameterizable  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Algo
    Class implementing mathematical utility functions for algorithms.
    AlgoTest  
    ArrayIndexComparator  
    AThermalIntegrator
    Implements an integration step to numerically solve a ODE of the form dm/dt = mDotIn + mDotOut dTi/dt = Ai*Ti+Bi where - T = [T1 T2 ...
    ComponentConfigReader
    Utility class to extract configuration parameters from a machine component configuration file.
    ConfigReader  
    ConnectionTest  
    Defines  
    FluidCircuit
    Class to perform several checks and routines on fluid circuits
    FluidCircuitProperties
    General implementation of the properties of a component within a fluid circuit.
    FluidCircuitTest  
    FluidConnection
    class to extend IOConnection to perform with fluids
    FluidContainer
    Implementation of a fluid interface on a component
    FluidTest  
    IOConnection
    contains information on simulation input sources and targets through references to IOContainers of MachineComponents and SimulationControls.
    IOContainer
    Container for all model i/o
    LocalizationHandler  
    MaterialConfigReader
    Utility class to extract configuration parameters from a material configuration file.
    ParameterSet  
    PhysicalValueTest  
    PropertiesHandler  
    SamplePeriodConverter
    converts a double array from length a to b. if the original array is shortened, samples will be integrated, if the target array is longer than the original, a linear interpolation is used.
    SamplePeriodConverterTest  
    ShiftProperty<T>
    ThermalArrayStatus Preserves the property of the thermal array at a specific time step
    SimulationConfigReader  
    UtilsTestSuite
